name: WCW vs. The World [PSX]
description: WCW vs. the World is a professional wrestling video game for the PlayStation video game console. It was the first game developed by The Man Breeze (who later became the AKI Corporation) to be released outside Japan and is an American localization of their Japanese game Virtual Pro Wrestling, the first game in the Virtual Pro Wrestling series. WCW vs. the World marks the first World Championship Wrestling video game released during its rise amidst the Monday Night Wars.
